locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: They're not cleaning the shower. 9 people waiting, 5 room with the door open and nothing is moving. This place doesn't care at all about the driver.

… are disgusting and the employees who "clean" them are worse. Got kicked out and screamed at and threatened for waiting for my shower that I paid for, saying I had been parked there for longer than 30 minutes , when I told them I was waiting …
The Shower rooms are clean, they have body wash and provide towels and it is only 20$ definitely recommend!

… most discriminating service from the night manager. I was using their shower which I paid for when she came knocking at my door and demanded I leave because she said I was in there for 2 hours. This of course was a lie because her …
Wish it had laundry but shower and store and women's restroom clean staff are friendly enough
It's a middle of the day. 11 drivers are waiting for the shower. All showers are open actually.

What a disappointment. I walked in to purchase a shower and the manager, Mathew, asked if i was a truck driver to which i replied no. He then tells me that showers are for truckers only. He directed me to a Love’s or a 7-11 nearby. I said …

Every time I come here the hot water is out so no showers EVEN THOUGH THE HOT WATER WORKS IN THE BATHROOM. I would much rather be told we aren't doing showers than be lied to and expected to believe it all across America Pilot hot water …

… moves here. Paint dries faster than they move. Seems that crackheads and all sorts of strange looking individuals constantly inhabit this place, begging for money and shower credits. People that work inside are overwhelmed and can't deal …

Literally the best chain of gas station/pit stops. You can take a shower if needed and they are always super clean restrooms and facilities. Great prices and being a rewarded member gives you 3c off each gallon... it adds up when your …

locations.content: Salinas Valley Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great food! But very pricey. Convenient stop; Truck/trailer wash, fuel, food, shower, and laundry. Limited parking maybe 30-40 trucks. The MAJOR DOWNSIDE: Short Hours! Saturday 8:00am to 5:00pm. Closed on Sunday. Open 6:00am to 10:00pm M-F. …
I love this place I don't shower or use the rest room here cause it needs a lot of attention but the food is amazing try the strawberry cake
Beauty , smile, and Good service but no points no rewards  for fuell diesel .   just offer a shower each 100galons .

showerReviews.reviewText:
Worst experience with this love’s stop !
Long wait for the shower. Nobody was ahead of me in the waiting list ! But they still want the customers to wait. Nobody wants to clean the shower and do their job specially the night staff.
Great place, employee are friendly and polite, place is clean,, so are shower's, Open 24 hours and cheapest gas in town

For a multi-million dollar franchise, I cannot believe that they put the most worthless shower heads in. Could hardly rinse my razor because of the horrible water pressure. Also, whoever the architect was that designed the parking lot must …
Do not come here if you want a shower quickly. 11 people in line waited 3 hours. Nobody was cleaning and all showers had open doors. I will be parking at Pilot from now on for shower.
Clean truck stop with gas and diesel. Bathrooms, shower and laundry.

… there is zero Star rating available I would give that to this truck stop staff member there good for nothing I stop for shower and there is no shower waiting but I still have to wait for one hour because all the shower was dirty and the …
